mapper.insert: insert into ljy_area_dic (id, name, areaNo, parent, isActivated, isTradingArea, isHot, level, isChina, pinyin, creationDate, createdBy, modifyDate, modifiedBy) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areano,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parent,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isactivated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{istradingarea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ishot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ischina,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedby,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update ljy_area_dic set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, areaNo = #{areano,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent = #{parent,jdbcType=BIGINT}, isActivated = #{isactivated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isTradingArea = #{istradingarea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isHot = #{ishot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isChina = #{ischina,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creationDate = #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createdBy = #{createdby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifyDate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifiedBy = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, areaNo, parent, isActivated, isTradingArea, isHot, level, isChina, pinyin, creationDate, createdBy, modifyDate, modifiedBy from ljy_area_dic where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
